description: Beatty sequence for sqrt(3); complement of A054406.
comments: 0 <= A144077(n) - a(n) <= 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 09 2008A080757(n)=a(n+1)-a(n); A171970(n)=floor(a(n)/2); A171972(n)=a(A000290(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 20 2010Numbers k>0 such that A194979(k+1) = A194979(k) + 1. - _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 02 2014
